overview: Marnie is a thief, a liar, and a cheat. When her new boss, Mark Rutland, catches on to her routine kleptomania, she finds herself being blackmailed.
tagline: The more he loved her . . . The more she hated him . . . For trying to unravel her secret!
cast: Tippi Hedren|Sean Connery|Diane Baker|Martin Gabel|Louise Latham
